message.content:
{
  "daily_summary": "Portfolio +2.54% since cost; value ₹26,620.45 with ₹806.30 cash (~3%). Leaders: LAURUSLABS (+9.23%), LTF (+5.16%), BSE (+4.68%); laggards: IDBI (-4.37%), BEL (-1.03%). Concentration risk: LTF (31.6%) and BEL (31.2%) = ~62.8% of equity exposure. Bias: Financials (LTF, IDBI), Industrials/Defence (BEL, BHEL), Exchange (BSE), Pharma (Laurus). This past week’s stance (ride winners, avoid averaging losers, tighten risk) largely worked; no trades taken. Into Monday: prioritize risk control (trail stops on winners), only add on strength confirmations, and consider trimming outsized positions into strength to reduce concentration.",
  "top_signals": [
    {
      "symbol": "LTF",
      "signal": "Partial book/Trail",
      "reason": "Up ~5% from cost and largest weight; into 290–300 supply zone, prefer realizing some gains and raising stop to protect P&L.",
      "price": 292
    },
    {
      "symbol": "BEL",
      "signal": "Add on strength / Cut on weakness",
      "reason": "Heavy weight but slightly below buy. Prefer add only on sustained move back above recent pivot; cut if breakdown extends.",
      "price": 422
    },
    {
      "symbol": "LAURUSLABS",
      "signal": "Scale-out near round number; trail stop",
      "reason": "Quick ~9% pop; psychological resistance near 1000. Lock some gains and trail remainder.",
      "price": 1008
    },
    {
      "symbol": "BSE",
      "signal": "Buy the dip only",
      "reason": "Momentum strong; prefer add on retest of 2400–2450 zone with tight risk rather than chase.",
      "price": 2405
    },
    {
      "symbol": "BHEL",
      "signal": "Add above breakout",
      "reason": "Sideways; confirmation above 275 improves risk/reward; otherwise hold with stop under recent swing.",
      "price": 275
    },
    {
      "symbol": "IDBI",
      "signal": "Wait for reclaim / Protect downside",
      "reason": "Below cost and underperforming. Avoid averaging down; reconsider if it reclaims 100 with volume; exit on close <96.",
      "price": 96
    }
  ],
  "emergency_trades": [],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 806.3,
    "total_value": 26620.45,
    "holdings_count": 6,
    "holdings": [
      "BSE: 1 units",
      "LTF: 30 units",
      "BEL: 20 units",
      "LAURUSLABS: 3 units",
      "BHEL: 10 units",
      "IDBI: 10 units"
    ]
  },
  "screening_notes": [
    "Watch SUZLON: strong multi-month trend; prefer buy-the-dip into prior breakout zones, not breakouts.",
    "IEX: prolonged base; monitor for clean breakout with volume; avoid if false breaks persist.",
    "AUBANK: improving credit metrics; look for higher-low setup to add if it clears recent swing highs.",
    "RVNL/IRCON (rail capex theme): remain strong; only add on pullbacks to 20/50-DMA equivalents with defined stops.",
    "KPITTECH: momentum name; consider on constructive pullback rather than chase; earnings volatility caution.",
    "MAPMYINDIA: growth + high ROCE; watch for tight consolidation breakout; size small due to liquidity.",
    "COFORGE/LTIM (IT mid): rotating strength; stagger entries, earnings risk high—buy post-results confirmation.",
    "IIFLSEC/ANGELONE (broking ecosys with BSE holding): correlation tailwind; add only on dips to avoid overexposure to same theme."
  ]
}
